organizations.name: post details director of land records & surveys assam jobs
office of the director of land records & surveys
land records & surveys assam vacancy details

text: Click here for Joint Director Post Details Director of Land Records & Surveys Assam Jobs 2017 – Consultant, Technical Asst & Other Posts: Government of Assam, Office of the Director of Land Records & Surveys has issued a notification for the recruitment of Consultant GIS, Computer Programming, Technical Assistant & Accountant vacancies on temporary & contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 15-02-2017 up to 03.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Director of Land Records & Surveys Assam Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 04 1. Consultant GIS: 01 Post 2. Computer Programming: 01 Post 3. Technical Assistant: 01 Post 4. Accountant: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 45 years for Post 1, 40 years for remaining posts as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc in Geo informatics from a recognized university for Post 1, M.Sc (IT)/ MCA/ B.Tech in Computer Science/ Software Engineering from a recognized university for Post 2, B.Sc (IT)/ B.Sc in Computer Science or BCA for Post 3 & B.Com, Computer Knowledge in Tally for Post 4. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application along witrh CV not exceeding 3 pages, 3 copies of recent passport size photographs, copies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, self addressed envelope of 9″ X 4″ size affixing postal stamp Rs. 5. 00 & envelope should be superscribed with “name of the post applied for” to the Office of the Director of Land Records & Surveys etc.,Assam Rupnagar, Ghy-32 on or before 15-02-2017 up to 03.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 15-02-2017 up to 03.00 PM. For more details like remuneration, qualification & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt Office of the Dy Commissioner Lakhimpur Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Consultant Posts: Govt of Assam, Office of the Dy Commissioner, Lakhimpur has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Consultant vacancies for Integrated Land records Management for Lakhimpur district on contract basis. Eligible candidates can walk in interview on 06-02-2017 from 11.00 AM. Other details like qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Office of the Dy Commissioner Lakhimpur Vacanct Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Consultant Age Limit: Candidates age limit should not be above 40 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc (IT)/ MCa/ B.Tech/ BE in Computer Science or IT Software Engineering from a recognized University with two years experience in installation, configuration and administration of servers on windows and linux platforms. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend the interview application in prescribed format along with all original documenls and self attested photo copies of all documents, 2 copies of recent passport size photographs on 06-02-2017 from 11.00 AM. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 06-02-2017 from 11.00 AM. Reporting Time: at 12.00 Noon. Venue : Deputy Commissioners Office, Lakhimpur, North Lakhimpur. For more details like Remuneration, duties & responsibilities & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – AERC Jobs 2017 – Joint Director Posts: Assam Electricity Regulatory Commission (AERC) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Joint Director (Tariff) vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 28-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… AERC Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Joint Director (Tariff) Age Limit: Candidates age should be 55 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering from a recognized University or CA/ ICWA/ Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) or Two years MBA in Finance recognized University with 20 years professional experience. For more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application along with complete Bio-data, attested copies of all relevant testimonials should be sent to the Secretary, Assam Electricity Regulatory Commission, ASEB Campus, Six Mile, Guwahati – 781001 on or before 28-02-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 28-02-2017. For more details like pay scale, experience, qualification & other information click on the link given below….
